summary:
Want to fight anywhere and anytime?
It\'s possible now!
Create your battle.....
descriptionHtml:
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<new version available<<<<<<>>>>>            http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29035      <<<<<<<<<

Required: Skyrim
----------------------Description: You never wanted to create great battle?
Ever wanted to Create Chaos?
Directory you can now do!
How?
With alteration spell directory you can have a army in a wink
How It Works?
The same way a normal spell.
Limits?
no this does not work as an invocation, have new kind of spell. 
Number of people?
For the time between 2 and 6

Known problem: I can not created a script to all meet in one spell, someone \\\"one has a clue how to do and help me please?
------------Located: no far from Riverwood sawmill. (see picture). Look your new shack. search a sack. There is also a book with all the army group in detail (number and type of enemy).

Shack:
Bedroll
Tanning rack
Enchanting table 
Alchmy table 
Cooking spit
5 satchel, 1 barrel and 3 sac for food.
Group available:
bandit
forsworn
Thalmor
Draugr
Imperial
Stormcloack
Mammoth
vampire
Werewolf
Dwemer
Dragon with Dragon Priest
Blade
creature Hunter
horse
Army:
Draugr Army. Total 17Unit
Dwemer army with centurion, sphere and spider :). Total 16Unit


Future project: add Falmer, hagraven, giant, creature prey (hare. ..), predator creature (saber cat, troll ....) and a merchant, and more ...

Do not forget to vote if you like ;).
Comment to bug.

Sorry For My English :S
author: Skydrawn33
